attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned petition the Prime Minister to reconceptualise the United Kingdom strategy for involvement in the Nigerian Niger Delta mediation to embrace community engagement techniques and methodologies because it is only by tackling social and economic disadvantage that communities are empowered and change can happen.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
